thread.title: Nomura to Suspend Creation of Shares in Three ETFs
thread.title_full: Nomura to Suspend Creation of Shares in Three ETFs - WSJ

author: Leslie Josephs
title: Nomura to Suspend Creation of Shares in Three ETFs
text:
Nomura Asset Management Co. said it would suspend on Friday the creation of new shares in a large leveraged exchange-traded fund, as well as two others, citing liquidity concerns.
The measure applies to the Next Funds Nikkei 225 Leveraged Index Exchange Traded Fund, which has about $6.2 billion in assets. The fund’s shares are up about 8.7% this month. Nomura said shares will continue to trade.
